title: Pset_DistributionChamberElementTypeFormedDuct
description: Space formed in the ground for the passage of pipes, cables, ducts.

ClearWidth.title: ClearWidth
ClearWidth.description: The width of the formed space in the duct.

ClearDepth.title: ClearDepth
ClearDepth.description: The depth of the formed space in the duct.

WallThickness.title: WallThickness
WallThickness.description:
The thickness of the duct wall construction
NOTE: It is assumed that chamber walls will be constructed at a single thickness.

BaseThickness.title: BaseThickness
BaseThickness.description:
The thickness of the duct base construction
NOTE: It is assumed that duct base will be constructed at a single thickness.

AccessCoverLoadRating.title: AccessCoverLoadRating
AccessCoverLoadRating.description: The load rating of the access cover (which may be a value or an alphanumerically defined class rating).
